data.text: @HoustonHealth Wait. You forgot the thousands of side effects that were released.  Keep the shit away from children!!!!!! This is SICK.  You are complicit.
@HoustonHealth false, you will be held accountable for what you are doing. Nuremberg 2.0 is coming
@HoustonHealth *The risk of a child having a serious adverse reaction to COVID-19 is very low.*
